ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 192 cores x 4 FP32/cycle (NEON 128-bit) x 2 (FMA) = 1,536 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 192 cores x 2 FP64/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) = 768 FP64 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 192 cores x 8 FP16/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) = 3,072 FP16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 192 cores x 16 INT8/cycle (NEON) x 2 = 6,144 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (3600 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: AmpereOne 192-core ARM server processor. TSMC 5nm. Custom ARM Neoverse-based cores. Single-threaded cores (no SMT). 128-bit NEON SIMD. 8-channel DDR5. Cloud-native design optimized for scale-out workloads.
